abstract.t: The multiple Destination option on IPv6(MDO6) is an elastic multicast delivery system. MDO6 uses a list of final unicast addresses of each destination node that is embedded into an optional routing header, as the destination of a datagram. Routers on the multicast path could forward datagrams by looking up the next hop router for individual final unicast addresses with the existing unicast routing table.
